item.title: Fundamentals of Data Engineering: Foundation and Building Blocks
item.description: [v.1.0] (01/05/2024): Post started! 1. Data Engineering Described What Is Data Engineering? A data engineer gets data, stores it, and prepares it for consumption by data scientists, analysts, and others. Data engineering is the development, implementation, and maintenance of systems and processes that take in raw data and produce high-quality, consistent information that supports downstream use cases, such as analysis and machine learning. Data engineering is the intersection of security, data management, DataOps, data architecture, orchestration, and software engineering.
